title: Thunderbird Supernova - open email in a new tab with middle mouse button
content:
Good morning, how I can enable again opening email in a new tab with click on middle mouse button? Before upgrade to Supernova working fine this, after upgrade I am not able find how enable this again.

Thank you Jan Zilina
creator: zilina

title: Asking for password every time I open the client
content: Since this supernova update I'm being asked for my outlook password nearly every single time I open up the client. This never happened prior to this update and I've been using Thunderbird now for at least 5 years.
creator: Dicehunter

title: Thunderbird email won't download
content: I re-installed Thunderbird but email will still not download. I can send though.
creator: petenlil

title: Thunderbird  in W11
content: Installed TBird on new computer with W11. In the Set Up Existing Email Address page after entering the email address and password the message "Configuration found in Mozilla ISP database" is displayed. With the IMAP configuration selected clicking "Done" the message "Unable to log in at server. Probably wrong configuration, username or password". This combination of configuration, ID and password works on my existing W7 computer. How do I get Thunderbird to recognize my email and password?
creator: HawaiiEmo

title: how to install version 102 when version 115 is already downloaded
content: I want to use ImportExportTools NG but it is not available for version 115. I already downloaded version 115 so I want to downgrade my thunderbird version to 102. How can I do it
creator: dnjseka927

title: Incoming email missing the body.
content: Every once in a while a complete series of incoming emails has nothing in the body. I click any recent 'good' email. Perhaps the subject is "XYZ". Clicking any of the 'bad' emails will show the good email's From, To, and subject of "XYZ". It seems to last for, maybe 20 incoming emails, then the issue stops. It has happened several times over the last year. If I go out to Xfinity the same emails do not have this issue. How do I fix this?
creator: JimJamie

title: Cannot send email after upgrade from TB 102.15 to 115.2
content: I have 2 mail accounts synced to TB. Both are hotmail accounts. I can send emails from 1 but not the other after updating TB from 102.15 to 115.2. Everything else seems to work. I've changed no settings and they seem correct as far as I can tell. When I try to send mail from the problem account, a blank browser pop-up comes for a few seconds (authentication?) then disappears; then, the "sending" bubble comes up and then times out giving this error message: "Sending of the message failed. The message could not be sent because the connection to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.office365.com timed out. Try again." What is a solution for this? Thanks in advance.
creator: natehathaway
